topic: No continuous story clusters identified due to insufficient article count
evaluation: The initial inspection revealed that while some articles are thematically related, no groups of three or more articles could be identified as being continuous and developmental. For instance, articles on GP workforce issues (IDs: society/2025/sep/17, society/2025/sep/19), women's safety (IDs: education/2025/sep/25, education/2025/sep/23), and maternity care (IDs: society/2025/sep/11, society/2025/sep/17) formed groups of two. As per the strict criteria, a minimum group size of three is required for validation. Therefore, the cluster is deemed inadequate for forming a continuous story, and all articles are categorized as noise in this context.
